issue.title: NativeFile should support standard IOBase methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2036](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2036). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If `NativeFile` supported most/all of the standard IOBase methods (<https://docs.python.org/3/library/io.html#io.IOBase),> then it'd be easier to use arrow files with other python libraries. Would at least be nice to support enough operations to use `io.TextIOWrapper`.
